document_notes.text:
This update for perl fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2018-18311: Fixed integer overflow with oversize environment (bsc#1114674).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Perl before 5.26.3 and 5.28.x before 5.28.1 has a buffer overflow via a crafted regular expression that triggers invalid write operations.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
